name: Contemporary
description: A style characterized by clean lines, minimalistic decor, and a focus on functionality.

name: Modern
description: Sleek and stylish with an emphasis on open spaces and smooth surfaces.

name: Traditional
description: Warm, rich colors with classic furniture pieces and an inviting atmosphere.

name: Minimalist
description: A focus on simplicity and functionality, with few decorative elements.

name: Scandinavian
description: Clean lines, natural materials, and neutral colors for a cozy, inviting space.

name: Industrial
description: Raw, unfinished materials like exposed brick, metal, and wood for a rugged aesthetic.

name: Bohemian
description: Vibrant colors, eclectic decor, and a relaxed, artistic vibe.

name: Rustic
description: Natural materials, earthy tones, and a cozy, woodsy feel.

name: Mid-Century Modern
description: Vintage-inspired with clean lines, organic curves, and bold colors.

name: Farmhouse
description: A mix of traditional and rustic elements for a warm, homely space.

name: Eclectic
description: A mix of different styles and periods to create a unique, personalized space.

name: Transitional
description: A balanced blend of traditional and contemporary elements for a timeless look.
